column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Head of Dai Li says : " You sent for us , Princess .
#Text=Do you know how long it took you to get here ?
#Text=" Head of Dai Li says : " Uh ... a few minutes , I guess .
#Text=" Azula says : " Five , to be precise , in which time an assassin could 've snuck in , done away with me and been on his merry way !
#Text=" Head of Dai Li says : " My apologies , Princess .
#Text=" Azula says : " Is this how you plan to treat your new Fire Lord ?
#Text=With tardiness and disloyalty ?
#Text=" Head of Dai Li says : " The Dai Li would never betray you !
#Text=" Azula says : " And I 'm sure that 's just what you told Long Feng before you turned against him and joined me !
#Text=You 're all banished !
#Text=" Head of Dai Li says : " But ... " Azula says : " Goodbye !
#Text=" Azula says : " Please send in the next group on your way out !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sshhh ... " Toph says : " That 's how it 's done !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Good work , Toph !
#Text=Time to take control of the ship , take the wheel .
#Text=" Toph says : " That 's a great idea !
#Text=Let the blind girl steer the giant airship !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I was talking to Suki .
#Text=" Toph says : " That would make a lot more sense .
#Text=" Suki says : " What are we going to do about the rest of the crew ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Take us down closer to the water .
#Text=I 've got an idea .
#Text=Attention , crew , this is your captain speaking .
#Text=Everyone please report to the bomb bay immediately for hot cakes and sweet cream .
#Text=We have a very special birthday to celebrate .
#Text=" Qin Lee says : " Hey , I 'm Qin Lee .
#Text=I work up in communications .
#Text=" Engineer says : " Oh , hi .
#Text=I work down in the engine room .
#Text=That 's probably why we never met before .
#Text=Big airship , you know ?
#Text=" Qin Lee says : " Yep .
#Text=" Engineer says : " So , do you know whose birthday it is ?
#Text=" Crew member says : " I ca n't believe the captain remembered my birthday !
#Text=He really does care !
#Text=" Engineer says : " Happy birthday .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Fire Lord Ozai , here we come .
#Text="
